body.name: Fashion Fidgets Mermaids Fantasy Series – Fidget Doll for Girls Created by Mrs. Bench
body.stockDetail: Only 12 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 16 hrs 10 mins
features: NEW MERMAID FIDGET DOLLS WITH POP TUBE MERMAID TAILS! Dive into the fantastical world of Fashion Fidgets Mermaids with all new Fantasy Series Dolls. Each doll has beautiful shimmer details and fabulous mermaid style.

POP TUBE MERMAID TAILS: Each doll includes a 3-piece pop tube mermaid tail. Stretch, bend and style the doll’s tail in so many ways. The top of the mermaid tail is removable and becomes a mini skirt for the doll. The fin of the mermaid tail is a fidget spinner that detaches from the pop tube. Mix and match mermaid tails, fins and mini skirts for even more looks.
15+ WAYS TO FIDGET IN STYLE: Each Fashion Fidgets Mermaid doll comes with 15 ways to fidget from their cheeks to their hair to their mermaid tails.

CREATED WITH MRS.BENCH! Each Fashion Fidgets Pet was created in partnership with fidget queen, Mrs. Bench! Fashion Fidgets combine the stress release & focusing benefits of fidget toys and sensory play with the imaginative pretend play of a doll! It’s a sensory experience from unboxing to play time!

COLLECT AND TRADE! Collect all 9 beautiful Fashion Fidgets Mermaids. Grow your Fashion Fidgets collection by trading with friends with the included trading board! Trade for the dolls you want or trade for your favorite mermaid tail pop tube. Fun for every fashionista ages 5+.
body.description: Dive into the fantastical world of Fashion Fidgets Mermaids with new Fantasy Series dolls, created with fidget queen Mrs. Bench. Each doll features a removable pop tube mermaid tail, over 15 ways to fidget and beautiful shimmer details. Stretch, bend and style the doll’s tail in so many ways to create different mermaid looks. The top of the mermaid tail becomes a mini skirt for your doll. The fin of the mermaid tail is also a fidget spinner. Or fidget with the mermaid tail pop tube on its own. Mix and match mermaid tails, fins and mini skirts for even more looks. Trade with your friends using the included trading board. Each doll includes a removable keychain, so you can take them on the go! Collect all 9 mermaid dolls! Fashion Fidgets combine the stress release benefits of a fidget toy, with the imaginative play of a doll! Fun for every fashionista ages 5+.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the mermaid theme and the pop tube tails!
reviews.reviewText: A fun new fidget doll! Love this new mermaid series from Fashion Fidgets. If you're familiar with Fashion Fidgets, it's the same size collectible doll, now with a fun pop tube mermaid tail. Such a clever idea! The tail is a wider pop tube with a little skirt-shaped topper that the doll can easily slide into. And then on the bottom of the fin is a fidget spinner, which is really cool. You can also take the doll out of the tail and take the tail apart, so you have a bunch of different fidgets. I got one of the boy characters, Trendsetter Sal with a blue pop tube and shiny shoes. He also has a fun fidget clicker on his head. And you can clip the little keychain to a backpack or purse. Overall this is a really cool idea, a fun new way to fidget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was bought as an Angel Tree gift so I don’t know how well it holds up to being played with. It was really cute and it was what the child asked for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Fashion Fidgets Mermaids Fantasy Series is not only a fantastic fidget toy but also makes for a wonderful Valentine's Day present for kids. With their colorful and imaginative design, these dolls are sure to capture the hearts of young ones. They provide a fun way to engage in sensory play while sparking creativity and imaginative storytelling. Whether given as a standalone gift or as part of a Valentine's Day surprise, these fidget dolls are sure to bring joy and excitement to any child's day.

reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter loved it. She was very excited when she found out the baby doll could come out of the accordion tube! The quality is very good for the price I paid. Would consider another purchase!
